subject: URGENT: Shipment SHP-2024-001 Missing - Order #ORD-789
body: Hello, we received order ORD-789 but shipment SHP-2024-001 is nowhere to be found. We need this resolved immediately as we have customers waiting. The invoice INV-2024-050 shows it was shipped on Jan 25. Please advise. We are in compliance with HS Code 2020.

subject: Delivery Confirmation - SHP-2024-002
body: Shipment SHP-2024-002 has been successfully delivered. Tracking reference: TRACK-2024-555. Order ORD-790 completed as scheduled.

subject: COMPLIANCE ISSUE: Shipment SHP-2024-003 - HS Code Violation
body: Shipment SHP-2024-003 for order ORD-791 has been flagged for incorrect HS code classification. The shipment is on hold. Please provide corrected documentation referencing invoice INV-2024-051. This is a critical compliance matter.

subject: Invoice INV-2024-052 Payment Received
body: Payment of $5,000 received for invoice INV-2024-052. Thank you for your business.

subject: Question about order ORD-792
body: Hi, just checking on the status of order ORD-792. When can we expect shipment SHP-2024-004 to arrive? Any tracking information available?
